name: [Prototype] Hack Hex
description:
Gameplay

Click and drag anywhere to move all units in one of the 6 hex tile directions.

Goal

Your character (blue) needs to collect the key and enter the exit (door) tile.

How to Play

Attack enemies (red) with weapons you pick up from the game board. You swap weapons when you move onto a tile with a weapon. Force enemies to pick up gems and the key and then attack them so they drop them (dropped items are yellow) for you to pick up.

Sword

Attacks an adjacent enemy.

Dagger

Attacks an adjacent enemy even if he could move away.

Bow 

Attacks an enemy more than 1 tile away.

Shield 

Stuns an adjacent enemy.
